title: Loading into Game Freezes Computer Completely
body:
I recently just reinstalled League after a long hiatus and when I tried to hop into a bot game it just completely locked up my laptop. I didn't notice any problems until entering the game. I tried to reenter the game and the moment the game loaded completely it froze my computer up again. I'm not sure what other info you need, so I'm basically just asking if this happens to others or if there are some trouble shooting options for me to try and fix it. 

Thanks for your time.

replies.body: This freezing issue may be a result of a Windows 10 update.  It auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) which has been causing freezing and fps problems.  Disable that bar for the fix!
